color: upright|left|The name ''Korea'' is derived from Goguryeo, also known as ''Koryŏ'', one of the Three Kingdoms of Korea.  The name ''Korea'' derives from the name ''Goryeo''. The name ''Goryeo'' itself was first used by the ancient kingdom of Goguryeo in the 5th century as a shortened form of its name. The 10th-century kingdom of Goryeo succeeded Goguryeo,
